trans-unit.source: In the [Azure Portal]( https://azure.portal.com/), click **Browse** > **App Services**, then click your Mobile App backend > **All settings**, then under **Mobile** click **Push**.
trans-unit.target: In the [Azure Portal]( https://azure.portal.com/), click **Browse** > **App Services**, then click your Mobile App backend > **All settings**, then under **Mobile** click **Push**.

trans-unit.source: In Push notification services, click **Windows (WNS)**, enter the **Security key** (client secret) and **Package SID** that you obtained from the Live Services site, then click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: In Push notification services, click **Windows (WNS)**, enter the **Security key** (client secret) and **Package SID** that you obtained from the Live Services site, then click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: Set the GCM API key in the portal
trans-unit.target: Set the GCM API key in the portal

trans-unit.source: Your Mobile App backend is now configured to use WNS to send push notifications to your Windows app using its notification hub.
trans-unit.target: Your Mobile App backend is now configured to use WNS to send push notifications to your Windows app using its notification hub.
